definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Moab, site un-known (MI:19:20 [[יהץ]])—[[יהץ]] Is 15:4, Je 48:34; c. [[ה]] loc. [[יׇהְָחָה]], on border of territory of Amorites (under Sihon) Nu 21:23, De 2:32; also [[בְּיׇהְָחָה]] Ju Jdg 11:20; called [[יַהֲחָ֫ה]] Jos 13:18 (assigned to Reuben); [[יַ֫הְחָה]] 1Ch 6:63 (Levit. city in Reuben), Je 48:21.
